message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more.  How about $11,000? I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's try to reach an agreement.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am still only willing to pay $9,500. I hope this proposal works for you.
